title: 차량 자율주행 글로벌 슈퍼 스타트업 Optimization engineer
content:
주요 업무
        1. Algorithm optimization & Implementation on Embedded platform - H/W platform containing Deep learning Accelerator & DSP : RENESAS R-Car vision series, TI TDA series, nVidia w/GPU, etc - OS : Linux (yocto), RTOS - ARM Neon2. Camera Capture / Preview function porting on target platform (if needed)3. Co-Work w/ algorithm engineers4. Communication w/ Customers

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          C C++
          ADAS
          embedded
          optimization
          rtos
          yocto
          자율주행차

채용 상세
        담당업무- Excellent C/C++ programming skills on embedded platform- Experience with multi-threading on embedded programming- (Preferred) experience with image processing on embedded system   Ex. Color conversion, resizing, image undistortion etc- (Preferred) understanding the Camera Preview/Capture Pipeline on embedded system- (Preferred) Experience with DSP programming
